name: The Stinking Mausoleum
tagline: Beech and hazel, the ground littered with nut husks. The stench of carrion pervades the whole hex.
description: Beech and hazel, the ground littered with nut husks. The stench of carrion pervades the whole hex.

points_of_interest.name: The Stinking Mausoleum
points_of_interest.description: Travellers can follow their noses to the source of the stench: a circle of collapsed stone buildings.
points_of_interest.entering: Travellers can follow their noses to the source of the stench
points_of_interest.interior: Inside the circle of the ruined walls and buildings, the ground is paved with white tile, now chipped and greying with age, and pocked with errant trees. A single stairway can be spied, in the middle of the courtyard, free of the rubble of the ruins. It leads down into the dark of the crypts.
points_of_interest.exploring: The courtyard stairway leads down to a network of cramped, dripping tunnels, buzzing with flies. The tunnels converge on a 200′ wide circular hall with a domed roof of cracked, pink porcelain.
points_of_interest.inhabitants: The Descendant sprawls across a treasure hoard in the Central Hall
special_features: Symbol: The motif of an eye ringed with thorns is carved repeatedly into the ruined stone
Tiled courtyard: Inside the circle of the ruined walls and buildings, the ground is paved with white tile, now chipped and greying with age, and pocked with errant trees
Stairs: A single stairway can be spied, in the middle of the courtyard, free of the rubble of the ruins. It leads down into the dark of the crypts
Stench: The carrion reek intensifies. Characters who do not mask the odour somehow suffer –1 to Attack Rolls
Echoes: Gasps and moans can be heard sporadically in the tunnels, echoing from the Central Hall

Treasures: A glittering mound of coins and other treasures is piled up in the centre of the hall: 2,000sp and 3,000gp stamped with the head of the King of Brackenwold, 6 bronze torcs set with a black opal (1,200gp each), a twisted ebony Staff of Darkness

npcs.name: The Descendant
npcs.description: A 20′ tall, vaguely humanoid agglomeration of maggot-riddled corpses, animated by a lust for living flesh to meld with itself.
npcs.speech: Gurgles and gasps out occasional syllables in Old Woldish ("rend," "flesh," "bone")
desires: Living flesh to meld with itself
possessions: Treasure hoard: 2,000sp and 3,000gp stamped with the head of the King of Brackenwold, 6 bronze torcs set with a black opal (1,200gp each), a twisted ebony Staff of Darkness
npcs.location: The Central Hall of The Stinking Mausoleum
npcs.stat_reference: Large Undead—Mindless—Chaotic, Level 9 AC 13 HP 54 Saves D7 R8 H9 B10 S11, Att 2 claws (+7, 1d10) and maw (+7, 2d6) Speed 40, Morale 9 XP 1,900
